description:
Overview:

20 Years of Marketing Experience in 60 minutes or less.

Whether you want to take a first step towards a career in marketing or you are running your own business as an Entrepreneur this practical & crash course in Marketing will start helping you within an hour.

What you will learn?

By completing this course you should be able to:

-Learn marketing in the simplest term

-What should be your main focus while running your business

-How promotion activities can be done at shoestring budget

-How you can succeed at networking events

-Selling best practices and what not to do

-Step by step marketing plan

-Aim of all your promotion activities & how your mind works

-How to develop a compelling message for your product or service

-How to measure the results of your marketing efforts

Course includes:

Your course includes video and text lectures along with home work for your self reflection.

This course is ideal for:

Startups & Entrepreneurs

Coach and Consultants

Graduate, Sales professionals & Customer Service Executives who are interested in marketing as a career.

Artists and Creative

You don't need any previous qualifications or marketing experience. However, if you are working or have business experience, this marketing course will certainly help you put your learning into practical context.
title: Crash Course in Marketing -Simplified 5 steps plan
